a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people living in urban and rural areas, World
Data source: World Bank based on data from the UN Population Division
Note: Because the estimates of city and metropolitan areas are based on national definitions of what constitutes a city or metropolitan
area, cross-country comparisons should be made with caution.
